00044 // Precondition:
00045 // Parametre: Sortie& os
00046 // Signification: un flot de sortie
00047 // Valeurs par defaut:
00048 // Contraintes:
00049 // Acces: entree/sortie
00050 // Exception:
00051 // Effets de bord:
00052 // Postcondition: la methode ne modifie pas l'objet
00053 //
00054 //! Simple appel a: Interprete::printOn(Sortie\&)
00055 /** \return Sortie\&<br>
00056 Signification: le flot de sortie modifie<br>
00057 Contraintes: */
00058 Sortie& LataToMED::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00059 {
00060   return Interprete::printOn(os);
00061 }

00083 void convert_domain_to_Domaine(  const Domain& dom , Domaine& dom_trio)
00084 {
00085 
00086 
00087 
00088 
00089 
00090 // dom_trio.les_sommets()=geom.nodes_;
00091 // mais geom.nodes est un FloatTab
00092   DoubleTab& som= dom_trio.les_sommets();
00093   int nx=1,ny=1,nz=1;
00094   if (dom.get_domain_type()==Domain::UNSTRUCTURED)
00095     {
00096       const DomainUnstructured& geom = dom.cast_DomainUnstructured();
00097       int dim1=geom.nodes_.dimension(0);
00098       int dim2=geom.nodes_.dimension(1);
00099       som.resize(dim1,dim2);
00100       for (int i1=0; i1<dim1; i1++)
00101         for (int i2=0; i2<dim2; i2++)
00102           som(i1,i2)=geom.nodes_(i1,i2);
00103     }
00104   else
00105     {
00106       assert(dom.get_domain_type()==Domain::IJK);
00107       const DomainIJK& geom = dom.cast_DomainIJK();
00108       const int dim = geom.coord_.size();
00109 
00110 
00111       nx=geom.coord_[0].size_array();
00112       ny=geom.coord_[1].size_array();
00113       nz=1;
00114       if (dim>2) nz=geom.coord_[2].size_array();
00115 
00116       som.resize(nx*ny*nz,dim);
00117 
00118       for (int i=0; i<nx; i++)
00119         for (int j=0; j<ny; j++)
00120           for (int k=0; k<nz; k++)
00121             {
00122               int nn=i*ny*nz+j*nz+k;
00123               som(nn,0)=geom.coord_[0][i];
00124               som(nn,1)=geom.coord_[1][j];
00125               if (dim>2)
00126                 som(nn,2)=geom.coord_[2][k];
00127             }
00128 
00129     }
00130 
00131   Zone zone_bidon;
00132   dom_trio.add(zone_bidon);
00133   Zone& zone=dom_trio.zone(0);
00134   zone.nommer("PAS_NOMME");
00135   Nom type_elem=dom.lata_element_name(dom.elt_type_);
00136   if (type_elem=="PRISM6") type_elem="PRISME";
00137 // zone.type_elem()=type_ele;
00138   zone.typer(type_elem);
00139 
00140   zone.type_elem().associer_zone(zone);
00141   zone.associer_domaine(dom_trio);
00142   if (dom.get_domain_type()==Domain::UNSTRUCTURED)
00143     {
00144       const DomainUnstructured& geom = dom.cast_DomainUnstructured();
00145       zone.les_elems()=geom.elements_;
00146     }
00147   else
00148     {
00149 
00150       zone.les_elems().resize((nx-1)*(ny-1)*(nz-1),zone.nb_som_elem());
00151       IntTab& elems=zone.les_elems();
00152       for (int i=0; i<nx-1; i++)
00153         for (int j=0; j<ny-1; j++)
00154           for (int k=0; k<nz-1; k++)
00155             {
00156               int nn=i*(ny-1)*(nz-1)+j*(nz-1)+k;
00157               nn=i+j*(nx-1)+k*((nx-1)*(ny-1));
00158               elems(nn,0)=i*ny*nz+j*nz+k;
00159               elems(nn,1)=(i+1)*ny*nz+j*nz+k;
00160               elems(nn,2)=(i)*ny*nz+(j+1)*nz+k;
00161               elems(nn,3)=(i+1)*ny*nz+(j+1)*nz+k;
00162               if (elems.dimension(1)>4)
00163                 for (int ii=0; ii<4; ii++) elems(nn,4+ii)=elems(nn,ii)+1;
00164             }
00165 // a coder
00166 // Process::exit();
00167     }
00168   zone.faces_bord().associer_zone(zone);
00169   zone.faces_raccord().associer_zone(zone);
00170   zone.faces_joint().associer_zone(zone);
00171 
00172 
00173   zone.type_elem().associer_zone(zone);
00174   zone.fixer_premieres_faces_frontiere();
00175 
00176 
00177 
00178   if (dom.id_.timestep_!=0)
00179     dom_trio.deformable()=1;
00180 
00181 }

00183 // XD format_lata_to_med objet_lecture nul 0 not_set
00184 // XD attr mot chaine(into=["format_post_sup"]) mot 0 not_set
00185 // XD attr format chaine(into=["lml","lata","lata_v1","lata_v2","med"]) format 1 generated file post_med.data use format (MED or LATA or LML keyword).

00187 // XD lata_to_other interprete lata_to_other -1 To convert results file written with LATA format to MED or LML format. Warning: Fields located at faces are not supported yet.
00188 // XD attr format chaine(into=["lml","lata","lata_v1","lata_v2","med"]) format 1 Results format (MED or LATA or LML keyword).
00189 // XD attr file chaine file 0 LATA file to convert to the new format.
00190 // XD attr file_post chaine file_post 0 Name of file post.
00191 Entree& latatoother::interpreter(Entree& is)
00192 {
00193   Cerr<<"syntax  Latatoother::interpreter format_post_supp [nom_lata||NOM_DU_CAS] [nom_fichier_sortie||NOM_DU_CAS]   "<<finl;
00194   Nom nom_dom, nom_lata,nom_fic;
00195   Nom format_post_supp;
00196   is >>format_post_supp>> nom_lata>>nom_fic ;
00197 
00198   std::set<std::string> formats( { "LML", "LATA", "LATA_V1", "LATA_V2", "MED" });
00199   Nom tmp = format_post_supp;
00200   if(formats.count(tmp.majuscule().getString())==0)
00201     {
00202       Cerr << "Error, format " << format_post_supp << " is not supported!" << finl;
00203       Process::exit();
00204     }
00205 
00206 // Creation d'un sous-groupe contenant uniquement le processeur maitre
00207   ArrOfInt liste_pe(1);
00208   DERIV(Comm_Group) group;
00209 // on se met en non axi le temps de la conversion
00210   int axi_sa=axi;
00211   axi=0;
00212   PE_Groups::create_group(liste_pe, group);
00213 
00214   if (PE_Groups::enter_group(group.valeur()))
00215     {
00216       if (nom_lata=="NOM_DU_CAS")
00217         nom_lata=nom_du_cas()+".lata";
00218       if (nom_fic=="NOM_DU_CAS")
00219         nom_fic=nom_du_cas();
00220       Nom filename(nom_lata);
00221       LataOptions opt;
00222       LataDB  lata_db;
00223       LataFilter  filter;
00224       set_Journal_level(0);
00225 
00226       LataOptions::extract_path_basename(filename, opt.path_prefix, opt.basename);
00227       opt.dual_mesh = true;
00228       opt.faces_mesh = false;
00229 // on ne veut jamais creer le domaine IJK
00230       opt.regularize = 0;
00231       opt.regularize_tolerance = 1e-7;
00232       read_any_format_options(filename, opt);
00233 // Read the source file to the lata database
00234       read_any_format(filename, opt.path_prefix, lata_db);
00235 
00236       filter.initialize(opt, lata_db);
00237 
00238 // On met dual_mesh a "false" si on lit un domaine de polyedres PolyMAC (pas encore supporte)
00239 // et on-reouvre la database:
00240       Noms geom_names = filter.get_exportable_geometry_names();
00241       int elt_type = filter.get_geometry(Domain_Id(geom_names[0], 1, -1)).elt_type_;
00242       Cerr << elt_type << finl;
00243       if (elt_type==Domain::polyedre || elt_type==Domain::polygone)
00244         {
00245           opt.dual_mesh = false;
00246           filter.initialize(opt, lata_db);
00247         }
00248 
00249       Nom nom_pdb(nom_fic);
00250       Nom format_post_(format_post_supp);
00251       if (format_post_=="lata")
00252         format_post_+="_V1";
00253 
00254 // copie de Postraiter_domaine
00255 
00256       Nom type("Format_Post_");
00257       type+=format_post_;
00258       Format_Post  post_typer;
00259       post_typer.typer_direct(type);
00260       Format_Post_base& post=ref_cast(Format_Post_base,post_typer.valeur());
00261       Nom nom_2(nom_pdb);
00262       Nom format_post_bis(format_post_);
00263       if (format_post_bis.debute_par("lata"))
00264         format_post_bis="lata";
00265       Nom suffix(".");
00266       suffix+=format_post_bis;
00267       nom_2.prefix(suffix);
00268 // int est_le_premie_post=0;
00269       int format_binaire_=0;
00270       if (format_post_bis!="lata")
00271         post.initialize_by_default(nom_2);
00272       else
00273         post.initialize(nom_2,format_binaire_,"SIMPLE");
00274 
00275 // ecriture des domaines
00276       {
00277 
00278         Noms geoms = filter.get_exportable_geometry_names();
00279 
00280         for (int i = 0; i < geoms.size(); i++)
00281           {
00282             Domain_Id id(geoms[i], 1, -1);
00283             const Domain& dom = filter.get_geometry(id);
00284 
00285             Domaine dom_trio;
00286             dom_trio.nommer(geoms[i]);
00287             convert_domain_to_Domaine(dom,dom_trio);
00288             int est_le_premier_post=(i==0);
00289             post.ecrire_entete(0.,0,est_le_premier_post);
00290             int reprise = 0;
00291             double t_init = 0.;
00292             post.preparer_post(dom_trio.le_nom(),est_le_premier_post,reprise,t_init);
00293             post.ecrire_domaine(dom_trio, est_le_premier_post);
00294 // meddrive.ecrire_domaine(nom_fic,dom_trio,dom_trio.le_nom(),mode);
00295 
00296 
00297             filter.release_geometry(dom);
00298           }
00299       }
00300 // les champs
00301       const char *suffix_vector_names[] = { "X", "Y", "Z" };
00302 
00303       for (int t = 1; t < lata_db.nb_timesteps(); t++)
00304         {
00305           int timestate=t;
00306 // if (filter.get_nb_timesteps() > 1)      timestate++;
00307           Noms geoms = filter.get_exportable_geometry_names();
00308           double time=filter.get_timestep(t);
00309           post.ecrire_temps(time);
00310           for (int i = 0; i < geoms.size(); i++)
00311             {
00312               Domain_Id id(geoms[i], timestate, -1);
00313               const Domain& dom = filter.get_geometry(id);
00314 
00315               Domaine dom_trio;
00316               dom_trio.nommer(geoms[i]);
00317               convert_domain_to_Domaine(dom,dom_trio);
00318               Field_UNames fields = filter.get_exportable_field_unames(geoms[i]);
00319               for (int j = 0; j < fields.size(); j++)
00320                 {
00321 // const Nom& nom= fields[j].get_field_name();
00322 // if ((nom!=Motcle("ELEM_FACES"))&& (nom!=Motcle("FACES"))&&  (nom!=Motcle("ELEMENTS")))
00323                   {
00324 
00325                     int est_le_premie_post=(i==0);
00326                     post.init_ecriture(time,-1.,est_le_premie_post,dom_trio);
00327                     Field_Id fieldid(fields[j],timestate,-1);
00328 
00329                     DoubleTab values;
00330                     try
00331                       {
00332                         const FieldFloat& field = filter.get_float_field(fieldid);
00333                         {
00334                           const FloatTab& values_lata = field.data_;
00335                           int dim1=values_lata.dimension(0);
00336                           int dim2=values_lata.dimension(1);
00337                           values.resize(dim1,dim2);
00338                           for (int i1=0; i1<dim1; i1++)
00339                             for (int i2=0; i2<dim2; i2++)
00340                               values(i1,i2)=values_lata(i1,i2);
00341                         }
00342 
00343 
00344                         Nom nom_type;
00345                         if (field.localisation_==LataField_base::ELEM)
00346                           nom_type="ELEM";//"CHAMPMAILLE";
00347                         else if (field.localisation_==LataField_base::SOM)
00348                           nom_type="SOM";//!< CHAMPPOINT";
00349                         else
00350                           {
00351                             Cerr<<nom_type<<" not coded ...... "<<finl;
00352                             Cerr<<__FILE__<<":"<<(int)__LINE__<<finl;
00353                             exit();
00354 
00355                           }
00356                         Nom type_elem=dom.lata_element_name(dom.elt_type_);
00357                         Noms unites(values.dimension(1));
00358                         Noms noms_post(values.dimension(1));
00359                         Cerr<<"Extraction "<< time<<" "<< geoms[i]<<" "<< fields[j].get_field_name()<<finl;
00360                         Nom nom_post,ajout;
00361 
00362                         nom_post=fields[j].get_field_name();
00363 // pour eviter qu'en med on est le champ aux faces et sur le dual avec le meme nom
00364                         if (dom_trio.le_nom().finit_par("_faces")) nom_post+="_Centre";
00365                         ajout="_";
00366                         ajout+=nom_type;
00367                         ajout+="_";
00368                         ajout+=geoms[i];
00369                         for (int ii=0; ii<values.dimension(1); ii++)
00370                           {
00371                             noms_post[ii]=nom_post;
00372                             if (values.dimension(1)==dom_trio.les_sommets().dimension(1))
00373                               noms_post[ii]+=suffix_vector_names[ii];
00374                             else
00375                               noms_post[ii]+=Nom(ii);
00376                             noms_post[ii]+=ajout;
00377                           }
00378                         nom_post+=ajout;
00379 // exit();
00380 // meddrive.ecrire_champ(type,nom_fic,geoms[i],fields[j].get_field_name(),values,unites,type_elem   ,time,0);
00381 
00382                         post.ecrire_champ(dom_trio,unites,noms_post,-1,time,time,nom_post,geoms[i],nom_type,"iii",values);
00383                         filter.release_field(field);
00384                       }
00385                     catch(...)
00386                       {
00387                         Cerr<<fieldid.uname_.get_field_name()<<" is not a FloatField !!!"<<finl;
00388                       }
00389                   }
00390                 }
00391               filter.release_geometry(dom);
00392             }
00393 
00394 
00395         }
00396       int fin=1;
00397       post.finir(fin);
00398 
00399 
00400 // delete [] les_domaines;
00401 // delete [] list_champ;
00402       PE_Groups::exit_group();
00403     }
00404   barrier();
00405 // on remet eventuellement axi
00406   axi=axi_sa;
00407   return is;
00408 }

00423 // XD lata_to_med interprete lata_to_med -1 To convert results file written with LATA format to MED file. Warning: Fields located on faces are not supported yet.
00424 // XD attr format format_lata_to_med format 1 generated file post_med.data use format (MED or LATA or LML keyword).
00425 // XD attr file chaine file 0 LATA file to convert to the new format.
00426 // XD attr file_med chaine file_med 0 Name of the MED file.
00427 Entree& LataToMED::interpreter(Entree& is)
00428 {
00429   Cerr<<"Syntax Latatomed::interpreter nom_lata||NOM_DU_CAS nom_fichier_sortie||NOM_DU_CAS   "<<finl;
00430   Nom nom1,nom2;
00431 
00432   is >> nom1>> nom2;
00433   Nom instruction("med ");
00434   instruction+=nom1;
00435   instruction+=" ";
00436   instruction+=nom2;
00437   Cerr<<"command generated by latatomed "<<instruction<<finl;
00438   {
00439     latatoother latatoother;
00440     EChaine cmd(instruction);
00441     latatoother.interpreter(cmd);
00442   }
00443 
00444   return is;
00445 }
